issues.title: Shopping Cart Persistence
issues.body:
## Description
As a customer, I want my shopping cart to persist across sessions so that I don't lose my selected items if I close the browser.

## Business Value
Reduces cart abandonment rates and improves conversion by preserving user shopping intent.

## Acceptance Criteria
- Cart items are saved to database after each addition/removal
- Cart is restored when user logs in
- Cart items expire after 30 days of inactivity
- Guest carts are converted to user carts upon registration
- Out-of-stock items show appropriate messaging

issues.title: Product Recommendation Engine
issues.body:
## Overview
Implement a machine learning-based product recommendation system that suggests relevant items based on browsing history and purchase patterns.

## Why
Increases average order value and improves customer satisfaction through personalized shopping experiences.

## Prerequisites
- User behavior tracking is implemented
- Product catalog is indexed and searchable
- ML model training pipeline is established

## Done Criteria
- Recommendations appear on product pages and homepage
- Recommendations update in real-time based on browsing behavior
- Click-through rate on recommendations is measured
- Recommendation quality improves over time
- Users can dismiss recommendations

issues.title: Payment Gateway Integration
issues.body:
## Description
Integrate Stripe payment gateway to support credit card, debit card, and digital wallet payments.

## Business Value
Enables secure online transactions and supports multiple payment methods for customer convenience.

## Acceptance Criteria
| Payment Method | Status | Notes |
|----------------|--------|-------|
| Credit Cards | ✓ | Visa, Mastercard, Amex |
| Debit Cards | ✓ | All major providers |
| Apple Pay | ✓ | iOS only |
| Google Pay | ✓ | Android and Web |
| PayPal | Pending | Integration in progress |

## User Guide
### Making a Payment
1. Add items to cart
2. Proceed to checkout
3. Select payment method
4. Enter payment details
5. Review and confirm order
6. Receive confirmation email

## Related
- Stripe API documentation: https://stripe.com/docs
- PCI compliance: #45

issues.title: Inventory Management Dashboard
issues.body:
## Summary
Create an admin dashboard for managing product inventory, tracking stock levels, and receiving low-stock alerts.

## Value
Prevents stockouts and overstocking by providing real-time inventory visibility.

## AC
- Dashboard displays current stock levels for all products
- Low-stock alerts are sent when quantity falls below threshold
- Inventory can be updated manually or via bulk import
- Stock movement history is tracked and auditable
- Dashboard is accessible to users with 'inventory_manager' role

issues.title: Customer Review and Rating System
issues.body:
## Description
As a customer, I want to read and write product reviews to make informed purchasing decisions and share my experiences.

## Business Value
Builds trust and credibility, provides social proof, and increases conversion rates.

## Preconditions
- User has purchased the product
- User is logged in

## Acceptance Criteria
- Customers can rate products from 1 to 5 stars
- Customers can write text reviews (up to 1000 characters)
- Reviews can include photos (up to 5 images)
- Reviews are moderated before publication
- Average rating is displayed on product page
- Reviews can be sorted by date, rating, or helpfulness

## Instructions
### Writing a Review
1. Navigate to product page
2. Click "Write a Review"
3. Select star rating
4. Write review text
5. Optionally upload photos
6. Click "Submit Review"
7. Review enters moderation queue

### Flagging Inappropriate Reviews
1. Click "Report" on the review
2. Select reason (spam, offensive, etc.)
3. Provide additional details
4. Submit report

issues.title: Order Tracking and Notifications
issues.body:
## Description
Provide customers with real-time order tracking and automated notifications at each stage of the fulfillment process.

## Business Value
Reduces customer support inquiries and improves customer satisfaction through transparency.

## Acceptance Criteria
- Order status is updated in real-time (processing, shipped, delivered)
- Customers receive email notifications at each status change
- Tracking link is provided for shipped orders
- Estimated delivery date is displayed
- Customers can view order history

## Connections
- Integration with shipping providers: #48
- Email notification templates: #8

issues.title: Wishlist Functionality
issues.body:
## Overview
Allow customers to save products to a wishlist for future purchase consideration.

## Why
Encourages repeat visits and provides insights into customer preferences.

## Setup
- User authentication is implemented
- Product catalog is available

## Done Criteria
- Users can add/remove products to wishlist
- Wishlist is accessible from user profile
- Wishlist can be shared via unique URL
- Price drop notifications for wishlist items
- Move to cart functionality available

issues.title: Coupon and Discount System
issues.body:
## Description
As a marketing manager, I want to create and manage promotional coupons to drive sales and customer engagement.

## Business Value
Increases sales during promotional periods and enables targeted marketing campaigns.

## Acceptance Criteria
- Coupons can be percentage-based or fixed amount
- Coupons have start and end dates
- Coupons can have usage limits (per customer and total)
- Coupons can be restricted to specific products or categories
- Invalid or expired coupons show appropriate error messages
- Coupon usage is tracked and reportable

## User Guide
### Creating a Coupon
1. Navigate to Admin > Promotions > Coupons
2. Click "Create New Coupon"
3. Enter coupon code (e.g., SUMMER2026)
4. Select discount type and amount
5. Set validity period
6. Configure usage limits
7. Click "Save"

### Applying a Coupon (Customer)
1. Add items to cart
2. Proceed to checkout
3. Enter coupon code in the promo field
4. Click "Apply"
5. Discount is reflected in order total

issues.title: Gift Card System
issues.body:
## Summary
Implement a gift card system allowing customers to purchase, send, and redeem gift cards.

## Value
Generates additional revenue and provides gifting options for customers.

## Prerequisites
- Payment gateway is integrated
- Email notification system is functional

## AC
- Customers can purchase gift cards in denominations of $25, $50, $100, or custom amounts
- Gift cards can be sent via email with personalized messages
- Gift cards have unique codes and are validated at checkout
- Gift card balance is tracked and displayed
- Partial redemptions are supported
- Gift cards expire after 2 years

issues.title: Multi-Currency Support
issues.body:
## Description
Support multiple currencies to enable international sales and provide localized pricing.

## Business Value
Expands market reach and improves conversion rates for international customers.

## Acceptance Criteria
- Support for USD, EUR, GBP, and JPY
- Currency is detected based on user location
- Users can manually switch currency
- Exchange rates are updated daily
- Prices are displayed in selected currency throughout the site
- Orders are processed in customer's selected currency

## Links
- Currency conversion API: https://exchangerate-api.com
- Pricing strategy documentation

issues.title: Customer Loyalty Program
issues.body:
## Description
As a returning customer, I want to earn loyalty points for purchases that can be redeemed for discounts on future orders.

## Business Value
Increases customer retention and lifetime value through rewards and incentives.

## Acceptance Criteria
- Customers earn 1 point per $1 spent
- Points can be redeemed at a rate of 100 points = $5 discount
- Points balance is visible in user profile
- Points transactions are logged (earned, redeemed, expired)
- Bonus point promotions can be configured
- Points expire after 12 months of inactivity

## How To
### Earning Points
- Complete purchases (automatic)
- Refer friends (bonus points)
- Write product reviews (bonus points)
- Complete profile information (one-time bonus)

### Redeeming Points
1. Go to checkout
2. View available points balance
3. Select points to redeem
4. Discount is applied to order total

## History
Loyalty program launched in Q2 2026 with initial tier structure.

issues.title: Product Comparison Feature
issues.body:
## Overview
Allow customers to compare specifications and features of up to 4 products side-by-side.

## Why
Helps customers make informed decisions and reduces decision fatigue.

## Setup
- Product specifications are standardized in the database
- Comparison UI is designed and approved

## Done Criteria
- Users can add products to comparison list from any page
- Comparison view shows products in a table format
- Key specifications are highlighted
- Differences are visually emphasized
- Comparison can be shared via URL
- Comparison list is limited to 4 products
